casebody.data:
DISCRETIONARY APPEALS ALLOWED

99-788. State v. Eppinger.

Cuyahoga App. No. 72686. Discretionary appeal allowed; sua sponte, cause held for the decision in 99-765, State v. Suffecool, Stark App. No. 1998CA00101; briefing schedule stayed.

Douglas, Resnick and F.E. Sweeney, JJ., dissent.
